articles.title: Tessie Launches Black Friday Deal: Lifetime Licenses Are Back
articles.description:
Utah-based Tessie is bringing back its biggest Black Friday offer, and it’s a solid pickup if you use your Tesla every day. The app continues to be the best third-party Tesla app in our opinion, with deep data tools, automation features, and support across iOS, Android, and smartwatches. For Black Friday, Tessie is removing subscriptions […]

articles.title: SpaceX Puts Starlink Hardware on Amazon for the First Time
articles.description:
SpaceX has quietly taken a major step toward broadening Starlink’s retail reach in the U.S.: Starlink hardware is now being sold directly through Amazon. Starlink’s own support documentation has been updated to list Amazon as an authorized retailer across the U.S., giving customers a new way to pick up the company’s satellite dishes and related […]

articles.title: Tesla Begins Cybertruck Deliveries in First Overseas Market
articles.description:
Tesla officially kicked off Cybertruck deliveries in South Korea on Thursday, marking the all-electric pickup’s long-awaited overseas debut. “On November 27, 2025, the first Cybertruck deliveries were completed in Korea,” Tesla Korea confirmed the milestone on X. “Thanks to the unwavering support of our owners, Cybertruck has made its debut on Korean roads. We look […]

articles.title: Tesla Opens First All-in-One Center in India
articles.description:
Tesla has officially opened its first all-in-one Tesla Center in India, located on the ground floor of Orchid Business Park in Gurugram, Haryana. The new facility, inaugurated today by state officials including Chief Minister Nayab Singh Saini, is the company’s first location in the country to combine retail, demo drives, after-sales service, deliveries, and charging […]

The post Tesla Opens First All-in-One Center in India appeared first on TeslaNorth.com.

Eligible Model S, Model 3, Model X, Model Y, and Cybertruck owners in the U.S., Canada, Puerto […]
